name: Sex in the City
description: You will learn about the sexual politics of the city and how cities and their neighbourhoods become sexualized and desexualized spaces. In Sex in the City, you will examine what “sex” means to Toronto’s varied, multicultural communities by looking at urban space, cultural productions, law enforcement, safety and health resources and more. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
exclusions: Innis One, Munk One, New One, St. Mike's One, Trinity One, Vic One, Woodsworth One
